content.detailedDescription: I didn't notice it while talking photos but observed when i went through photos..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Observed when in went through photos

content.detailedDescription: Upon returning home with my family from dinner, my wife spotted a very large black triangular craft hovering roughly 500ft above a residential area. it had large white solid lights on each of the three corners of the craft and a pulsating red light on what appeared to be the rear. we could actually see framework or something on the side facing us, which indicted it wasn't a smooth surface but rather a metallic structure. as i turned north into the subdivision it made a turn toward the ne and, after a few seconds without making a sound, it ascended to a tiny point in the sky in an instant. at the moment is took off into the sky, the sky seemed to bend around the lights of the craft. before, during and after the sighting we could see normal aircraft in the sky, as there is a close-by small commercial airport. i cannot imagine no one else, particularly pilots, didn't see this craft. it was enormous.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Family & myself saw very large black triangle hovering above residential area before ascent.

content.detailedDescription: Seen bright lights hovering up down about a mile away between 2 small mountains then came towards us at high speed we are sitting in car ufo stops begind to hover about 100 feet away we notice car being dragged in its direction we start car drive away both had really bad headaches after
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen bright lights hovering up down

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed. i wake early every day and i always sleep with my blinds open. planes from heathrow mainly travel in a westerly direction and planes from city airport ascend in a slight north easterly direction. i see planes travel across the skies all the time and know the usual flashing lights. i noticed a large bright green light in the sky  

a) very bright 
b) it was framed right in the centre of my window 
c) the light was travelling in a direction that planes never travel 
d) it was travelling at a speed much quicker than a traditional plane/jet 

the bright green light was travelling at a fast pace but slow enough to give me time to look up and think 'what the hell is that'. staring at it i was trying to think what could it be and then it accelerated to a phenomenal speed into the distance until the light disappeared in a blip. 

i then just sat there thinking of all the possible things it could be. i know what planes look like travelling across the sky out of the same window and i know they travel at speed no where near this or in this direction.
content.summary: Bright green light flying south east over london. travelling very quick, accelerated to unknown speed and disappeared as it travelled into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was out playing with my kids on a nice summer evening. my daughter noticed a strange rainbow, it was not curved like a usual rainbow instead it was a blob of coulour in the sky. i took a picture and then noticed there was an object in the picture,an orb with 4 lights. i then pointed my phone at the object i could now see in the sky. i zoomed in and took another picture and noticed the lights had changed. i thought the object looked quite strange it seemed to emit a yellowish glow. i watched for another few minuets until it faded from sight travelling in a north easterly direction. this was at 19.46pm. it lasted for perhaps 20 mins. please zoom in on the photo for a clearer pic.
content.summary: I was out playing with my kids on a nice summer evening, we noticed a strange rainbow and i took a picture..I then notice a strange orb in the picture with four lights. i instantly pointed my phone towards in zoomed in and took another pictute.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a peak in immigration canyon in utah. i was simply panning around with my samsung note 4 snapping pictures rapidly of the landscape around me. at the time i saw nothing unusual. over a year later i decided to organize my albums on my pc and noticed this object as i was scrolling through my photos. at first i thought it could be an anomaly related to the large lens flare also present in the photo but after looking at the sorts of things in a google image search i found none that resembled this thing. i cannot comment on the movement and or animated nature of the object as i did not witness it at the time i took the photograph. the picture is in very high resolution and can be analyzed by professionals.
content.summary: Found in my photograph after the fact. i did not witness the object at the time of the picture. i was panning around snapping random photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out my daughters window at night. observed 3 red lights about the size of an airplane hovering north east of our home. it went straight up in the air, back down, and then straight up on the air again. it was huge. the lights then went abruptly out. the first impression was that it was a plane but it shot straight up and hovered.

the lights went out and completely gone. it was so large!
content.summary: Red lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: The three of us were headed back from farmington and we traveled southbound on hwy 371 then headed west bound on indian service road 5.  as we got on top of the hill, we noticed a bright light to the west and it was about the height of the mountain sitting in the sky.  we traveled west for about 20 mins and the light was still in the same spot.  all of a sudden the light disappeared.  we looked at each other wondering what it was.  about 30 seconds later we seen the light appear in the mountains but the light was smaller.  it was there for about 1 min and it disappeared.  we were all in shock and knew it was a ufo because relatives of mine had similar experiences.
content.summary: Bright light in steady position for 20 mins.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This 21 day siege of ufo's and orbs started at my hunting camp near grantsburg, wi, followed me to my home in stacy, mn and then followed me
everywhere i went. there were 3 types of objects. the first group were 4-5
black spheres that had a red or white light in it. they were 2.5 to 3 feet
in diameter. they would hover over my garage and in my yard. when i went 
out on my deck, they would come as close as 2 to 3 feet from me at a height
of 10 feet. when i flashed my light at them they would hide in the bushes
or the trees.  one afternoon, i was working on my computer which was 3 feet
from a big window. i looked up and one of the black orbs was 2 feet from 
the window.

the second group of objects were chevron shaped and had a bank of orange/
yellow windows across the top. they had small white lights around the front
of the craft. they were about 25 feet long and 12 feet wide. they would
perform multiple types of aerobatics, flipping around and would change 
their light patterns.

at the hunting camp there was a third type of craft that was 75 feet long.
the front of the object was a big circle, the main body looked like the
fuselage of an airplane, and the rear had 2 rectangular leg like appendages.

initially i was very fearful of the objects because there were so many of
them. i am a former navy man, and a field investigator with mufon. this
case is the mn side of my experience. for the wi side of this case, please
see case#80556. the wi case includes an alien attempt of abduction.
content.summary: Stalked, followed and terrorized by ufo's and orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at about 8:30 and after passing a stop light on a country road. i first noticed the lights because they were new. i know what the area looks like at night and they didn't fit in. at first i thought it might be some street lamps, but i realized they were too high up in the sky and too small, at least from that distance, which was about 3/4 of a mile from the closest i saw it from. as i got closer i realized it was not a streetlamp and that it was a little ways out over the woods to the left of the road, and seemed to be descending and moving forward to cross over the road. by the time i passed perpendicular to its direction of motion, it had moved across the road and out over the field on the other side a little ways, and i saw it from behind and it looked like a triangle of four yellowish amber lights. it seemed to be moving unnaturally slowly the entire time i could see it. from the time i first saw it to the time i lost sight of it, it couldn't have traveled more than a quarter of a mile, if that, and i first saw it from about 3/4 of a mile away while driving at about 35 mph. i wasn't scared or anything during the event, simply curious. i wanted to know what i was looking at. since the event i've been confused and trying to figure out what i saw. i lost sight of it when i turned right onto my street and it disappeared behind trees.
content.summary: Saw a slow-moving triangle shaped pattern of four yellowish-amber lights flying low across a road

content.detailedDescription:
Outside my house
looking towards sky
a star
moving unlike any plane or helicopter
felt like it wasnt real
it was fast it was going slow then disapeared
content.summary: I have a video but this isn't the first one i have seen.

content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1970.  i worked for caltrans as a right of way agent for the state of california.  i was taking some legal documents over to bakersfield to have a county judge sign.  i was traveling on route 58 west of mojave towards bakersfield and east of tehachopi in my 1957 chevrolet state car.  a state highway maintenance crew was repairing the westbound lanes.  traffic was stopped in these two lanes for up to 15 minutes.  i pulled right, off of the highway to a dirt and gravel turnout and backed up to a low level brush and rock area with no dirt roads behind me.

i sat in the car for a few minutes and decided to take a look at the documents i was taking to bakersfield for the judge.  before i got the documents out, i noticed something in my rear views mirror and turned to see what it was.

i was amazed to see a vehicle directly behind my car with two individuals wearing gray-white suits.  mine was the only car on the turnout.  no car could have possibly gone around the front or the back without me seeing or hearing it.  there was no sound at all.

i continued to look directly at the car and individuals directly through the back window.  the car was maroon in color with a dark top; the grill looked similar to an older buick.  the license plate was light in color with no discernible markings.

the two individuals in the car as stated wore jump type suits with no buttons.  they were slender with no visible hat or hair and their bodies appeared to be smaller than the average sized man.  their eyes were very dark and semi oval; little larger than a normal human. they stared at me and never blinked.  they both had two small holes for their nose, very small mouths, no lips and i couldn't see any ears.  nor could i see their arms due to their car hood hiding over half of their bodies.

after a few minutes of staring at each other, i noticed light traffic starting to slowly move on the highway again to the west.  so i drove from my parking area out to the paved highway going towards bakersfield again.

the highways west bound lanes were now open for the public.  i was driving about normal speed in the right hand lane, just west of where the 
state construction was.  looking to my left i saw a maroon car driving at my speed, parallel to me with the same individuals i had seen at the turnout.  the driver looked continuously to the front.  i immediately noticed that he had no nose and he was bald.  the passenger in the car was again staring directly at me.  we drove parallel to each other for about 15 seconds.

i didn't know what to do, so i waved my hand at them as if to say goodbye.  they immediately sped down the highway and disappeared around a moderate curve to the right.  i sped up to try and see the maroon car again but it had disappeared.  there were rather steep rock cliffs on the right side and no place to turn off the highway.

the next day driving from bakersfield to bishop, i stopped at the same turnout of my first encounter and went to the same spot.  i saw my tire tracks from the previous day but saw no other tracks behind mine.  wow!!

as you might deduce i've never breathed a word of these happenings for decades to anyone for fear of being ridiculed.  i've mulled over this experience many times over the years.

this is my true story of a very strange, mysterious and profound event.
content.summary: Not a ufo event exacty.  entities in car which seemed to appear out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription:
On dec 10, 2016 i was driving from toronto to hamilton, ontario along the queen elizabeth way highway, moving west. just as i as i entered mississauga at about 7 pm, i noticed a grouping of lights up and to my front-right, about 75 degrees above the horizon. i noticed immediately that it was not moving, and in fact twice in the next few minutes a plane flew past much lower. the grouping of bright white lights were arranged in somewhat of a triangle, although it seemed some of the lights extended beyond the corners of a triangle. the lights did seem to be arranged in straight lines, but not clearly on a horizontal or vertical plane. 
the shape created by the lights was a bit difficult to make out as they were quite high in the sky.

as i drove along, after a few minutes i though maybe these were lights on top of some structure or tower, but they were not blinking, and as i drove the grouping never moved position in the sky, as they would have done if i were driving past a structure. after about 5 -7 minutes it became apparent that
this was not a structure at all. i drove for 30 minutes with this grouping still to the front & right of me, at the same elevation, and seemed to be the same size, and i drove a distance of about 35 km. this was not a constellation; the lights were too large and tightly grouped, and of uniform size. besides, i have driven this route hundreds of times in my life and have never seen this grouping of lights. 

the lights continued to hang in the sky all the way to hamilton, as i drove along hwy 403 which continues west to hamilton from burlington, where the qew turns south to niagara falls. the lights faded out a couple of times for no more than 1 minute, but came back, and i believe this was due to cloud cover. 

i lost sight of the grouping as the 403 turns south into downtown hamilton, because i was no longer facing toward it.

i have attached a sketch of the grouping of lights. the number of lights & arrangement is approximate, since they were so high up/far away it was difficult to be completely discernible.
content.summary: Grouping of white lights in triangle or spokes shape high in sky unmoving for at least 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I made the orion star constellation in
my front yard using 7stones, and 7solar lights placed at each stone.
after weeks of arrangements, of being percise to my apporval, i had finished the greatest structure that i had ever made. as i laid outside staring into the nigjt sky, pondering…
praying to god, mainly for healing in my life…and eagerly longing to know more about real truth in our civilations history, on this july cloudy night with no visualability of the star constellation of orion…what suddenly appeared in a distance was simply out of this world! it was as if the night sky opened up and a huge oval shaped light pierced through the darkness and the clouds…red in color that would become brighter and brighter! i fumbled for my phone in hopes to take a picture, but found my phone suddenly not working at all…
i quickly stood to my feet, standing just outside of the orion constellation that i had structured in awe. i seem to be standing there frozen, staring into this huge impressive ball of light!
in the center of this light i saw a face
that seem to be smiling down at me,
but then soon afterwards the smile turned into an awful disappointing look…the ball of light seem to charge up for a few seconds and shot across the sky with amazing speed, disappearing right before my eyes!!!
later my cell phone came back to life and what i found on it was a picture that was not there before. a picture of what seems to be a face, that is unlike any face known to man. who was it!?
osiris? god? the devil!? i contacted organization and have had no feedback!?
content.summary: Huge red ball of light, magically peirced through the sky. in the center i saw a face, as it seem to generate power, shooting across the sky, disappearing without a trace. it looked like a magical red dragon!

content.detailedDescription: At 11:24 pm i was getting out of bed and noticed an unusual orange light out of my south facing window. i immediately opened the window to observe the object. it appeared just above mindbender ridge at about 22 degrees above the horizon off to my right moving slowly towards me from the west. the object was a bright pale orange color and was flickering-shimmering. as the object moved towards me for about a minute and a half it stayed at the same altitude which i am guessing was about 3000-5000 above me. when the object was directly above me i ran outside so i could continue to observe. moving very slowly the object seemed to be almost hovering and as i watched it i thought i could see it wobbling or wavering a little. just after i started observing outside the object started ascending, within 20 seconds it had become a small point of light still moving east but at an apparently greater speed moving  about like a distant airliner would appear.  after the object was out of sight, about 4 or 5 minutes after i first sighted it i went back inside and as i walked back into my bedroom i noticed another bright orange light being reflected off the east facing window. i quickly looked around and saw that it was another identical object in my south facing again. this second object followed the same path in the same manner. this time when the object drifted  overhead out of my view from the window i ran outside again but the object was gone. i now wish i had climbed out the window so not to have lost sight of the second object. time was 11:30 after second sighting. both objects were orb or disc shaped but i could not see any other features because of the brightness and distance of the objects, also they were silent and there were no other aircraft visible during or directly after this sighting. my feelings about this went as follows,i knew within a couple of seconds that i was looking at a ufo of some sort and was happy and excited to see it. i wanted to do my best to observe and describe it objectively thus leading me to open the window to view it with no distortion from the glass and then to run outside and stand in the snow in my underwear and bare feet. i was all that much more excited to see the second object. i was hoping to witness some utterly convincing burst of speed or abrupt direction change but what i saw totally convinced me of its unidentified nature. living in an area with a history of sightings i felt lucky to see this and possibly give more credence to what others have reported.
content.summary: Bright orange light slowly moved toward me from west at 22 degrees above horizon then ascended and moved east then second object did same

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette in a location off of rt. 70 in marlton, nj. 08053.  i heard what sounded like a military helicopter in the distance, so i moved to get a clear view of the sky because i wanted to see it.  it sounded extremely close and i could feel the power, vibrations, etc.  so finally it comes into view and it was hard to make out.  there was a red orb in the front, with the chopper in the back.  at first i though it may be top secret military craft with cloaking or reflection or something of the sort.  it was hard to make out in the night sky it being a black helicopter and all, but when i focused in on it i could make out a red/orangish orb shape which looked like it was glowing, producing and aura, and the helicopter behind it maybe. between 300-500 ft.  it was hard to make out and get a grasp with surroundings because it all happened so fast.  they were both flying in a straight path at what appeared to be high speeds.  i had to run around the corner to keep eye sight until it went over the tree line out of sight.  i had no means of following it and wouldn't have been able to with the speed and direction it was going , having to follow traffic laws and everything.  right after my father walked out the door because he heard the chopper from inside the house and came to check it out and also had to grab something out of the car.  when he was trying to lock it, he hit the lock button at least 3x and the car was still unlocked, so i'm unsure if it messed with the electrical system or whatever category you would place this in.  take note that he's not the best with newer technology though.  so i came on here to check if anybody else had reported it.  also take note there is military bases in the area.  fort dix and maguire afb.  i didn't see any reports so i figured if i would.  this is not the first time i've seen activity of this sort in my 20+ years in this area.  one was 10+ years ago, and one was over this past summer.  i made no reports of them or checked for any.
content.summary: Military chopper following ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I must first apologize that while i always used to preach id have a steady hand if i ever saw something, i kept losing this thing on my camera and tried to refocus. but, i did get some good shots at the beginning and the end.  this video was taken by me on 11/28/16 in porter ranch, ca around 4pm. i pulled up home from work and before getting out of the car i noticed the sky was full of chemtrails and i witnessed 3 planes at one time releasing in all directions. the atmosphere just felt creepy. i got out of my car after taking footage of one of the planes and i noticed flying was this glowing white orb or craft that was flying in and out of the trails. the beginning of the video and the end has the best focused shot but my camera just wouldn't zoom anymore. im hoping with image software you possess you can clear up and focus what we are looking at in this video. after i lost it in the trails i waited expecting to see it come out the other side and it never appeared again. i mean planes don't do that, right? anyway, let me know if you have any questions and i do hope you can at least clear up the shot well enough for a little more clarity. if you would like the short video i took of the chemtrails right before the sighting, let me know and ill send it. the second video im including is one i used klinemaster app on my phone just to invert the color and see shape more clearly. feel free to contact me if you have any further questions. thank you.


mike flevotomos




sent on my boost mobile samsung galaxy s7.
content.summary: Glowing orb craft flying in and out of chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 5:45 our son called us outside to look at what he saw in the sky. we all (3 adults + 1 minor) stepped out into the backyard, and looked up (west) to see what appeared to be an airplane (with it's typical blinking lights) surrounded by approximately 13 other objects around it. these objects appeared to be about the same size as the plane. they also blinked / twinkled with a white light. one of us also thought they might have a blinking red light as well. we stood for a couple of seconds, asking each other, "what are those?" quite sure this was unusual, 2 of us dashed inside to grab a cell phone and a camera. we took 1 video on cellphone, 1 video on a camera, and 3 still photos with the camera. (unfortunately none of the videos nor photos are very good, but we will submit all in case your team can find something.) the airplane was moving west from where we were watching, heading in the direction of our local airport. the other objects moved with it, and we watched until they all passed behind the trees and out of our view. we couldn't tell what the altitude was, since it was already dark out, and there was nothing to use as a reference point, other than what we believed to be a plane. we didn't hear any sounds, nor saw any beams of light, etc coming from any of the objects. we couldn't see where they went, nor if they landed. we didn't see them appear, as whatever was happening was already in progress when we spotted them. our 2 dogs were outside with us, and they didn't pay any attention to them at all, didn't bark or act out of character. nothing unusual was felt (physically or emotionally) by any of us that observed this. this is the first time any of us have seen something like this. it's also the first time that any of us have seen something that we weren't able to identify, or think could possibly be a ufo or similar phenomenon.
content.summary: Several blinking objects surrounding what looked like an airplane

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a bright light that looked to be as bright as aircraft landing lights coming from the south southwest heading north northeast. as i watched the light it dimmed slightly a couple of times as it reached 90 degrees to me it did not act like regular lights. as i continued watching the light move north northeast it changed direction toward east northeast. at that time i noticed an aircraft moving away moving from me in the northeast direction. the light moved into a trailing position behind the aircraft. as i watched the light and aircraft travel northeast the aircraft disappeared behind some trees at the same time the light went out.
content.summary: Bright light fell into a trailing position behind a commercial aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking in front of my house and as i looked up at the sun i noticed it had a large circle around it. i've seen these circles around the moon but never the sun. i went back into the house and after some time i sat down to view the pictures of the sun and that's when i saw the blue orb looking like object. i wondered if it was still there so after about 15 min i went out to the same area i took the first photos ant took a few more pointing toward the sun, back into the house to view them and sure enough they were there still. i was pretty amazed by now after seeing them on the next photos i went out one last time and took a few more pictures of the sun. i have approx 17 to 19 of the photos if your interested...I'm excited because i do believe we are not alone
content.summary: Taking pictures of sun due to circle around sun. noticed blue orb when i viewed pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in front of my house when i noticed a ring around the sun. i've noticed before around the moon but never the sun. i have an apple iphone 6 plus so i pointed toward the sun and snapped about 5 photos.. i went back in my house and after some time i looked at the photos and that's when i noticed the blue orb and was changing positions on each frame. i after viewing the first pictures i took i went back out to the same spot and still not being able to see anything with the naked eye, i aimed my camera at the sun again and took a few more shots, went in the house and noticed the blue orb once again in the photos in different areas near the circle of the sun. i went out one more time again going back to the same area and aimed my camera at the sun again and went back in the house. after viewing the photos in order taken (approx 17 to 19 photos) i was amazed seeing this orb object seeming to be going in and out of the ring that was made around the sun. i hope this is to some value to you because i do believe we are not the only ones in the universe.
content.summary: Took pictures of sun. didn't see object til viewing photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Mid night in open prison in bielefeld ummeln germany. over the garden disk shape objects.  mobile phones are out of power, local phone and electricity are gone. same of the prisoners has films theobject, and the guards takes all of the records away, in couple of minutes comes local police, and warns us, not to talk about it otherwise, we're going to have trouble with...... /..... /.....  all the blocks are under.........._.. /.... :/....   


i've film picture and tape film as a proof.  
i have been told, not to tell any other friend or relatives...
content.summary: Silent disk shape and standing at same location

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were out collecting sap from our maple trees in feb 1985.We loved looking at the stars and noticed one coming toward us from the se. we watched as it hovered over our field. it was pretty high in the sky. all of a sudden it broke into 5 pieces with 4 blasting out in 4 directions. what seemed to be the center stayed put for a couple of seconds then left in a slow zig-zag towards the se. was still for a second then blasted of towards the south.
we were pretty amazed to see what we saw. my daughter was only five at the time, we were not frightened but intrigued.
content.summary: The orb came from the se and then hovered above our field, it suddenly broke into 5 orbs 4 going in the 4 directions and the last bolted straight up and took a zig.Zag path to the se, stopped then bolted to the s and was gone so fast

content.detailedDescription: I was travelsouth on the florida turnpike headed to pompano beach,,,sudenly 2 bright lites appeared tomy rghtandfailly high in the sky,,,then a 3rd one joinedthem,,they were in asingleroudtoeach orher,,,they then decended towards me at about a 45angle til much lower,,,,they stoppedforafew seconds the went upata 45 angle tothe n eat tremenduce speed,,,another trucked right behind me also saw this,,,ifiremember right we pulledinto the turkey lake restareaforcoffee,,,,
content.summary: 2 round liteobjects apeared andstoped,,another joined second later,,,they decended ver fast and stopped thenwent ne and disapearedin asecond

content.detailedDescription: So i was walking outside my college in grimsby, england. as i was walking walking out i looked at the moon and thought how cool the moon looked. then i saw this very star like object in the sky which was very very high up and was moving quite slowly. it looked exactly like a big star.I realised it wasn't a star or any kind of aircraft by how it moved. it looked exactly like a star but moved in a weird way. it'd often go up and down changing heights and was heading west but it still remained quite slow. unfortunately as i tried to look at it more the light just disappeared. i moved myself away from street lights but i looked up and it was gone.
content.summary: Like a shooting star which changed direction on a couple occasions, very high in the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: As my wife and i were driving in the early morning hours she spotted a huge object out her window.I stopped the vehicle to see for myself.It was large and shaped like a carpenters framing square,triangle shaped,atleast 6 red lights,and a weird turquoise light that went off at its point.It was silent.It made my wife and i sick to our stomachs to see.It wasnt your normal plane it was huge and close enough to make out. i could not believe the size of it. we observe this for close to 10 minutes. i didn't know who to call or who to tell this to. i'm shocked and i'm still shocked at what i saw. unfortunately i didn't have my good phone with me but i believe i got a picture of it
content.summary: Absolutely amazing to see very large triangle shaped but in two pieces not three,red lights off and on and it was silent as could be

content.detailedDescription: My friend, who lived about 15 miles from me, called me shortly after 10 o'clock one night in feb. or march of 2012 and asked me to go out to my pasture and tell her what i saw. i walked out my back door and could see nothing out of the ordinary. so i proceeded toward my barn and walked around some trees to a clearing and in the sky about 45 degrees above the eastern horizon was a large bright white light, i remembered screaming but i don't remember what was said between my friend and i. it was round and made no noise and no apparent craft was visible. after a few seconds the light seemed to flicker away and as quick as it disappeared two more lights appeared directly below where the first light had been. again i screamed but this time i noticed that the horses were running up and down the fence line and neighing all the while and i had an overwhelming erie feeling along with the sense that something was creeping around behind me. again after a few seconds the light on the left flickers away then the light on the right followed. this time three lights appeared directly below the previous lights and one by one from left to right they each flickered away. the whole experience for me lasted 3 minutes but as for my friend, she had been observing the lights for several minutes before calling me and the color of the lights that she could see were different than the lights that i could see. i regret that i did not take pictures or a video but in my defense i was paralyzed and in shock at that moment and not to mention that i was still on the phone with my friend. as soon as it was over i left to pick up my daughter just down the road, when i returned home i could hear several helicopters in the distance. my first assumption as to what this might be was the moon but it didn't look like it was natural.
content.summary: Large lights appeared above my land

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the 101 north of hearldsburg when the driver spots two brown, transparent  ovals decending from what appeared to be 1,500 feet. he immediately freaks out, points to the objects and they decend down into the tree lines of a mountain, appearing to move south-east. they were oval in shape, 11 -15 feet in diameter and brown but transparent. they startled three grown men. this, of course happened in broad day light over the highway so it leads us to believe there were other witnesses. the duration was very short, as the objects dipped between the mountain range and the tree line.
content.summary: Transparent brown ovals defending in coordination with each other. friend spotted it decending and my brother and i also witnessed them.

content.detailedDescription: Yo estaba trabajando en una ladrillera al aire libre...Estaba empesando a batir e lodo para hacer los ladrillos eran como las 3 o 4 de la madrugada cuando un compañero de trabajo me dijo "mira jose"....Dirigiendose hacia el serro y yo mire una estela de luz pasando por encima del cerro iluminandolo como si fuera de dia y lo que en realidad brillaba era el humo dorado color oro que dejaba a su paso y cuando se estrello hizo un sonido seco solido metalico como si fuera un martillo gigante y un clavo gigante al golpear... despues de ese sonido mire un flashaso como de camara gigante...Todo ocurrio en mas o menos 10 segundos...A una distancia de mas o menos 7km de donde yo estaba trabajando y sucedio el 22 de febrero de 1997...Yo al ver algo asi con mis propios ojos pues me asombre por que ese serro tiene muchas historias y pues yo no sabia nada de cosas paranormales u ovnis y pues yo me quede con la idea de que eso que paso era parte de la leyenda del serro...Despues termine mi trabajo y me fuy al pueblo a descanzar y tomar una ciesta...Los dias pasaron y nunca se oyo' nada pasaron los anos y la tecnologia nos alcanzo y al checar el lugar por google earth yo no lo podia creer era o es un ovni estrellado y el proximo año cumple 20 años sin ser encontado inclusive estando el aeropuerto de mazatlan a 18km del lugar del accidente extraterrestre
content.summary: Ovni estrellado quedando en tres partes o mas separadas visibles

content.detailedDescription:
Was at work on 12/09/2016 approximately
3:30 pm (mountain time) and a co-worker and i spotted a round like object next to the sun, with blue, green, copper, gold colors. this is not the first time i have seen this object in the sky, next accross from the sun.
content.summary: Round object next to sun, star like
